dateTime.description: The date specified in the format YYYY-MM-DD or today.

activeZoneMinutes.description: Total count of active zone minutes.

fatBurnActiveZoneMinutes.description: The number of active zone minutes in the fat burn heart rate zone.

cardioActiveZoneMinutes.description: The number of active zone minutes in the cardio heart rate zone.

peakActiveZoneMinutes.description: The number of active zone minutes in the peak heart rate zone.
